fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Grakom are currently following ‘The EU ECO Label on printed paper’, ‘The EU ECO Label on paper’, ‘The new color legislation on Food Contact Materials (FCM)’, The Proposal for EU directive on single-use plastics’ and the development of EU Environmental footprint of products (PEF).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Danish Association for Communication, Design & Media (Grakom) is a trade and employers’ association. Its goal is to strengthen the profitability of Grakoms business members and at the same time ensure the greatest freedom of action as possible: 
 
As a trade association, Grakom monitors the developments in market conditions, legislation, technology, environment, etc. This knowledge is communicated to the members via Grakoms magazine, newsletters, website, courses, and member meetings.
